entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 except minus 11 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 except minus 11 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 7 except minus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
